"CONTACT INFORMATION 
" "Bug reports/additional help/asking for staff password please contact me at 003587@concordcollege.org.uk. 


"
"UPDATE AND SHARING
"
"You can find the latest version of this app at Settings -> Download/Update. You can share " "this app to your friend by pressing 'copy' and send the link to your friend. Please do so " "if you find it useful. 

"
"DOWNLOAD
"
"To download a file either from your email or from the VLE, you need to login from your browser. " "If download fails, go back to the app and try again. If still fails, please restart the app, and try again. 

"
"HOW TO SETUP THE OUTLOOK APP
"
"After downloading and installing Outlook from the play store, press '""get started""'. Enter " "your school email account (""id@concordcollege.org.uk""), and press '""continue""'. Choose 'Exchange' " "and press '""Show advanced settings""'." "Enter the following:
" "Server:" " webmail.concordcollege.org.uk;
" "Domain:" "CONCORD;
" "Username:" " Your id; 
" "Password:" " Your password;
" "Press next, and you are done.

"
"TIP: For those of you tech-savvy, the app 'Tasker' could be used to automate some parts of this app. If you are interested in how, contact me. "
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
